Open Internet Manifest

A living manifesto for a free, open and decentralized internet

Thesis 25 â€“ Join (or start) a local community node

Find a Mastodon, Matrix, or Nostr group in your city or region.

Or buy a Raspberry Pi and run Umbrel, Start9, or YunoHost. Check out the full step-by-step guide, including hardware links â†’ build your own Raspberry Pi node

One more node is one step closer to an internet that can no longer be turned off.

Start small. Start local. Start today.
